descriptionHtml:
[color=red][center][size=5][b]Ever wanted to raise your own undead army? Well now you can![/b][/size][/center][/color]
 
[center][img]http://images.epilogue.net/users/kseronarogu/Necromancer_Lord.jpg[/img]
 
[youtube]5I7Z3LrDbwM[/youtube][/center]
 
 
 
[color=red][size=5][b]-Introduction-[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]This mod changes the ritual stone power. My goal was to make it feel more \"necromancer-y\".

[i]- It takes ten seconds to cast, so you can\'t just use it in combat.
- It uses the casting animation of the master spells, so it really feels like your raising the dead.
- The range is considerably lowered, this means you\'ll have to go through some work to pile up the dead bodies to resurrect them all.
- Of course, it\'s still a once per day power, to avoid it being super over-powered.
- And it makes the minions permanent. (12 hour version included also)[/i]
 
  
 
The effect is that it makes it feel like your actually performing a powerful ritual.
To get the ability, just activate the ritual stone. It\'s located just east of Whiterun, follow the road to Windhelm, and you\'ll see it.

[color=red]NOTE:[/color][i]This mod only works if you go to the ritual stone and manually activate it, this will not work if you add the spell via console.[/i][/size]
 
 
 
[color=red][size=5][b]-Installation-[/b][/size][/color]

Just plop it in your data folder, or use the mod manager.
 
 
[color=red][size=5][b]-Compatibility-[/b][/size][/color]

Incompatible with anything that alters the ritual stone ability.
author: PeterTran
